column4: in nautilus... when rightclicking a file, there is a "Notes"-tab.. Question: is there a way to view or right content to that tab using the command line ?
you add things by typing in the big white space on that tab
-.- sure but how can I look at or edit text like this with the command line
do you mean, how to add text to the note section of a file? no idea
yep that is what I am looking for
it has to be saved somewhere...
not sure il have a google -- true
I did google but no results.. (no luck)
oh... I was hoping they are stored _in_ the file
thank you for finding out for me !
hm... maybe you have an other idea... may I pm you to describe what I need ?
sudo <devicename> up/down    eg        sudo eth0 up
